document.full_text: a virulent form of e.coli bacteria blamed on infected cucumbers from spain has killed 10 people in germany and sickened 300, health officials said on sunday while warning people not to eat suspect vegetables.
document.title: german e.coli outbreak death toll rises to 10
lines_and_colors: a virulent form of e.coli bacteria blamed on infected cucumbers from spain has killed 10 people in germany and sickened 300, health officials said on sunday while warning people not to eat suspect vegetables.
